memory.description: Persistent memory across Claude Code sessions - stores architecture decisions, API endpoints, common patterns, and project context

serena.description: Semantic code retrieval - understands code structure at symbol level (functions, classes, variables), powers /primer command

context7.description: Up-to-date documentation for any library - Python packages, FastAPI, Pydantic, pytest, and more

linear.description: Linear issue tracking - create issues, update status, link to commits (requires: /mcp to authenticate)

notion.description: Notion workspace - search pages, create pages, update documentation (requires: OAuth authentication on first use)
